name: CaliforniaSerogroupVirusDiseasesTestsForCaliforniaSerogroupVirusIgMAntibody
title: California Serogroup Virus Diseases (Tests for California Serogroup Virus IgM Antibody)
description: California serogroup virus disease includes California encephalitis virus disease, Jamestown Canyon virus disease, La Crosse virus disease, Keystone virus disease, Snowshoe hare virus disease, and Trivittatus virus disease.
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of selected California Serogroup Virus IgM antibodies.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: California serogroup, California encephalitis, Jamestown Canyon, La Crosse, Keystone, Snowshoe hare, and Trivittatus),(Exclusion Criteria: - Panel tests, interpretation tests
- All other Arboviral conditions not listed in Notes section)
